mng: to blame, to reprove, to reprimand, to expel, to oust, to reconnoiter, (of territory) to expand, saline marsh

exm.mng: to reject, to exclude, to eliminate, to remove, to repel
to angrily rebuke, to indignantly denounce
to criticize harshly, to denounce, to attack viciously
to reprimand, to rebuke, to berate, stern criticism
to be full of, to flood, to congest
to refute, to debunk, to deny, to denounce
to berate, to excoriate, to chide, also written 喝斥[he1 chi4]
